text: It was a nakedness of naivety to be clothed leaf by leaf with the disappointment of experience. Her first illusion consisted in the belief that all she need do was to go to an agent, visit half a dozen houses in one day, choose one, make an offer, put it in the hands of a lawyer and go away on her holiday while the whole transaction was put through.
handwritten_text: It was a nakedness of naivety to be clothed leaf by leaf with the disappointment of experience. Her first illusion consisted in the belief that all she need do was to go to an agent, visit half a dozen houses in one day, choose one, make an offer, put it in the hands of a lawyer and go away on her holiday while the whole transaction was put through.
